Package com.minhhop.cache

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheService Cache service that integrate with Redis
    CachedAspect CachedAspect will be get methods constains @Cached when this method is called; gen a key base on return type, method name, list argument value return value method if key is cached in cached; else invoke method and save key into redis Format gen key : "return Type + Method name + List arguments value"
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Cached.Type
  • Annotation Type Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Cached Indicates that a method (or all the methods on a class) can be cached.
